gen:link.msg:message: `IncomeFromCareServicesAndSocialSupport` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesOperatingIncomeBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_IncomeFromCareServicesAndSocialSupport')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesOperatingIncomeBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_IncomeFromCareServicesAndSocialSupport return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesOperatingIncomeBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfIncomeFromCareServicesAndSocialSupportCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesOperatingIncomeBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfIncomeFromCareServicesAndSocialSupportCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesOperatingIncomeBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfIncomeFromCareServicesAndSocialSupportDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesOperatingIncomeBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfIncomeFromCareServicesAndSocialSupportDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
